name: HR Footprints
description: HR Footprints is an HR Management Services Company providing services in the area of HR processes outsourcing. Founded in the year 2006, we have successfully completed 600+ assignments and have 25,000+ learners across HR Consulting, Learning and Organisational Development, Leadership Coaching and Talent Sourcing. We at HR Footprints believe in taking the time to work with you and your staff very closely to custom-tailor every component of your program to provide more personal, measurable goals. We work with our clients as their extended arms to provide HR Management services in HR Consulting, Learning and Development, Leadership Coaching and Talent Sourcing.
features: We bring more than 120 years of collective experience and ready access to our knowledge base.
We understand that our clients require more than mere advice; therefore, we collaborate during the execution of any HR interventions also.
We know that internal HR teams have a wide array of responsibilities and therefore we act as an extended arm and support.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Simplifying Excellence
ShortDescription: HR Footprints is an HR Management Services Company providing services in the area of HR processes outsourcing. F

Highlights.name: HR Services
Highlights.description: HR Studio, the HR Consulting, Services vertical of HR Footprints, adds value in organizational design, role definitions, performance management, HR policies, & talent management

Highlights.name: Recruitment Services
Highlights.description: Cherrypikz, the recruitment vertical of HR Footprints provides innovative hiring solutions from mid to senior and CXO levels.

Highlights.name: Learning Services
Highlights.description: LQube, the learning vertical of HR Footprints delivers experiential solutions in the areas of leadership transitions, personal effectiveness, and high-performing teams.

enhanced_description: HR Footprints, founded in 2006, is an HR Management Services Company specializing in HR processes outsourcing. With over 600 assignments completed and 25,000+ learners, they offer custom-tailored programs focusing on measurable goals. Their services are delivered through distinct verticals: HR Studio for HR Consulting and Services (including organizational design, role definitions, performance management, HR policies, and talent management); Cherrypikz for innovative recruitment solutions from mid to senior and CXO levels; and LQube for experiential learning solutions in leadership transitions, personal effectiveness, and high-performing teams. HR Footprints aims to act as an extended arm for internal HR teams, collaborating closely during the execution of HR interventions.
key_use_cases: Hiring solutions for mid to senior and CXO levels
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
competitive_advantages: Over 120 years of collective experience and access to a comprehensive knowledge base
Collaborative approach, providing execution support beyond mere advice for HR interventions
Functions as an extended arm to support internal HR teams with their responsibilities
Custom-tailored programs designed for personal and measurable goals
implementation_scenarios: Consultative project execution for HR interventions
roi_benefits: Custom-tailored programs for more personal, measurable goals
Enhanced support for internal HR teams to manage diverse responsibilities
scalability_features: Proven capacity to handle over 600 assignments and 25,000+ learners
Service offerings designed to cater to large and global enterprises
